/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly in the top left corner, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. 

On either side of the street, there are trees and shrubs, their green leaves contrasting beautifully with the blue sky. Parked cars line the side of the road, adding a touch of urban life to the otherwise tranquil setting. The street itself is made of dirt, adding a rustic charm to the scene. 

In the distance, a few buildings can be seen, their presence subtly reminding us of the cityscape that surrounds this peaceful street. The image is a beautiful blend of nature and urban life, captured in one frame. It's a snapshot of a moment in Beijing, where the old and new coexist harmoniously.
